resources.string:
EYE - the camera position in three dimensions X, Y, Z. The camera eye is pointing at the target.


Change the cameras x-y position by swiping your finger in a horizontal (x) or vertical (y) direction. To change eye-Z use the eye-slider



CENTER - how the camera eye is centered at the target in three dimensions X, Y, Z


Change how the camera eye is centered at the target by swiping your finger in a horizontal (x) or vertical (y) direction. z-direction is not used here. The center-switches has to be turned on.



FOV - Field Of View - Mesure in degrees that determines how wide the field of view is For instance - low fov-values has the effect of zooming in the object


To change the fov just use the fov-slider
